text: “Soni kumbuchilani ndema jaŵam'bisile jenumanja kuŵa ŵawinjila panyuma pa achina Adi, ni antaamiiche ndamo jambone pachilambo, nkulitaŵila majumba gamakulungwakulungwa muiŵata yakwe, soni ni nkusepa m’matumbi majumba, basi kumbuchilani indimba ya Allah, ni nkalapwaga pachilambo pakuwatanganya.”
